  5. Enter the total amount: SDG 2,499
  6. Complete the transaction
  7. Take a screenshot of the confirmation and upload it if required

How to pay with O-Cash:

  1. Open the O-Cash app on your phone
  2. Go to the "Send Money" section

  5. Enter the total amount: SDG 2,499
  6. Complete the transaction
  7. Take a screenshot of the confirmation and upload it if required
